name: Rice Dewy Bright Face Wash With Rice Water & Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 150 ml (Pack of 2)

summary: Achieve a salon-like glow at home with the Rice Facial Kit, featuring rice water and niacinamide to enhance skin texture and deliver glass-like skin in six easy steps.
